languages.text: {n}Кассия касается нагрудника в области Атласа.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_HarlequinsClearSoulstone}Ксеносам удалось освободить наших предков{/d} из заточения в Камне Душ. Память и мудрость тех, кто был до нас, послужат Дому, позволив возвести на руинах настоящего крепкий фундамент для будущих поколений. Я верую в это так же, как верую в божественный свет Императора".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия касается нагрудника в области Атласа.{/n} "Ксеносам удалось освободить наших предков из заточения в Камне Душ. Память и мудрость тех, кто был до нас, послужат Дому, позволив возвести на руинах настоящего крепкий фундамент для будущих поколений. Я верую в это так же, как верую в божественный свет Императора".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia touches her breastplate where the Atlas is located.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_HarlequinsClearSoulstone}The xenos have managed to free the souls of our ancestors{/d} from their confinement. The memory and wisdom of those that came before us will serve our House, helping build, upon the ruins of the present, a firm foundation for generations to come. I believe in that as I believe in the divine light of the Emperor."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия касается нагрудника в области Атласа.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_HarlequinsClearSoulstone}Ксеносам удалось освободить наших предков{/d} из заточения в Камне Душ. Память и мудрость тех, кто был до нас, послужат Дому, позволив возвести на руинах настоящего крепкий фундамент для будущих поколений. Я верую в это так же, как верую в божественный свет Императора".

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia touches her breastplate at the spot where the Atlas is located.{/n} "The xenos have managed to free the souls of our ancestors from their confinement inside the Spirit Stone. The memory and wisdom of those that came before us will serve our House, helping build, upon the ruins of the present, a firm foundation for generations to come. I believe in that as I believe in the divine light of the Emperor."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia touches her breastplate at the spot where the Atlas is located.{/n} "The xenos have managed to free the souls of our ancestors from their confinement inside the Spirit Stone. The memory and wisdom of those that came before us will serve our House, helping build, upon the ruins of the present, a firm foundation for generations to come. I believe in that as I believe in the divine light of the Emperor."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

The memory and wisdom of those that came before us will serve our House, helping build, upon the ruins of the present, a firm foundation for generations to come. I believe in that as I believe in the divine light of the Emperor."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

The memory and wisdom of those that came before us will serve our House, helping build, upon the ruins of the present, a firm foundation for generations to come. I believe in that as I believe in the divine light of the Emperor."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia touches her breastplate where the Atlas is located.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_HarlequinsClearSoulstone}The xenos have managed to free the souls of our ancestors{/d} from their confinement. The memory and wisdom of those that came before us will serve our House, helping build, upon the ruins of the present, a firm foundation for generations to come. I believe in that as I believe in the divine light of the Emperor."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅将手伸向胸甲，抚摸着嵌有圣仪的位置。{/n}“{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_HarlequinsClearSoulstone}异形已经解放了我们先祖的灵魂，让他们离开了牢笼{/d}。如今，先人的记忆与智慧将会为我们的家族服务，帮助我们在废墟上打下坚实的地基，荫庇子孙后代。我相信这一点，就像相信帝皇的圣光一样。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia touches her breastplate where the Atlas is located.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_HarlequinsClearSoulstone}The xenos have managed to free the souls of our ancestors{/d} from their confinement. The memory and wisdom of those that came before us will serve our House, helping build, upon the ruins of the present, a firm foundation for generations to come. I believe in that as I believe in the divine light of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅将手伸向胸甲，抚摸着嵌有圣仪的位置。{/n}“异形已经解放了我们先祖的灵魂，它们不再被禁锢在异形的灵魂石中。如今，先人的记忆与智慧将会为我们的家族服务，帮助我们在废墟上打下坚实的地基，荫庇子孙后代。我相信这一点，就像相信帝皇的圣光一样。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Cassia touches her breastplate where the Atlas is located.{/n} "The xenos have managed to free the souls of our ancestors from their confinement. The memory and wisdom of those that came before us will serve our House, helping build, upon the ruins of the present, a firm foundation for generations to come. I believe in that as I believe in the divine light of the Emperor."

languages.text: {n}Cassia se toca la coraza donde tiene el Atlas.{/n} «{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_HarlequinsClearSoulstone}Los xenos han logrado liberar las almas de nuestros antepasados{/d} de su prisión. Los recuerdos y la sabiduría de nuestros predecesores servirán a la casa ayudando a edificar sobre las ruinas del presente, sentando unas bases firmes para las generaciones futuras. Lo creo tanto como creo en la luz divina del Emperador».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia touches her breastplate where the Atlas is located.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_HarlequinsClearSoulstone}The xenos have managed to free the souls of our ancestors{/d} from their confinement. The memory and wisdom of those that came before us will serve our House, helping build, upon the ruins of the present, a firm foundation for generations to come. I believe in that as I believe in the divine light of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia se toca la coraza donde tiene el Atlas.{/n} «Los xenos han logrado liberar las almas de nuestros antepasados de su prisión en la joya espiritual. Los recuerdos y la sabiduría de nuestros predecesores servirán a la casa ayudando a edificar sobre las ruinas del presente, sentando unas bases firmes para las generaciones futuras. Lo creo tanto como creo en la luz divina del Emperador».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアはアトラスのある胸当てに触れた。{/n}「{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_HarlequinsClearSoulstone}異種族は、私たちの祖先の魂を閉じ込められていた状態から解放しました{/d}。先人たちの記憶と知恵は我が家に役立ち、現在の廃墟の上に、来るべき世代のための強固な基盤を築く助けとなるでしょう。皇帝の神聖な光を信じるように、私はそれを信じています」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia touches her breastplate where the Atlas is located.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_HarlequinsClearSoulstone}The xenos have managed to free the souls of our ancestors{/d} from their confinement. The memory and wisdom of those that came before us will serve our House, helping build, upon the ruins of the present, a firm foundation for generations to come. I believe in that as I believe in the divine light of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアはアトラスのある胸当てに触れた。{/n}「異種族は、私たちの祖先の魂を魂縛石の中に閉じ込められていた状態から解放しました。先人たちの記憶と知恵は我が家に役立ち、現在の廃墟の上に、来るべき世代のための強固な基盤を築く助けとなるでしょう。皇帝の神聖な光を信じるように、私はそれを信じています」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia berührt ihre Brustplatte, wo sich der Atlas befindet.{/n} "Es ist den Xenos gelungen, die Seelen unserer Ahnen aus ihrer Gefangenschaft zu befreien. Die Erinnerung und die Weisheit derer, die vor uns kamen, werden unserem Haus dienen, werden uns helfen, auf den Ruinen der Gegenwart ein festes Fundament für kommende Generationen zu errichten. Daran glaube ich ebenso fest wie ich an das göttliche Licht des Imperators glaube."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia touches her breastplate where the Atlas is located.{/n} "The xenos have managed to free the souls of our ancestors from their confinement. The memory and wisdom of those that came before us will serve our House, helping build, upon the ruins of the present, a firm foundation for generations to come. I believe in that as I believe in the divine light of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia berührt ihre Brustplatte, wo sich der Atlas befindet.{/n} "Es ist den Xenos gelungen, die Seelen unserer Ahnen aus ihrer Gefangenschaft in dem Seelenstein zu befreien. Die Erinnerung und die Weisheit derer, die vor uns kamen, werden unserem Haus dienen, werden uns helfen, auf den Ruinen der Gegenwart ein festes Fundament für kommende Generationen zu errichten. Daran glaube ich ebenso fest wie ich an das göttliche Licht des Imperators glaube."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia pose la main sur son plastron, à l'endroit où se trouve l'Atlas.{/n} « {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_HarlequinsClearSoulstone}Grâce aux xénos, les âmes de nos ancêtres ne sont plus prisonnières{/d} de leur confinement. Nous mettrons les souvenirs et la sagesse de nos aïeux au service de notre maison, afin de bâtir sur les ruines du présent des fondations solides pour les générations futures. C'est ma conviction, aussi forte que ma foi en la lumière divine de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia touches her breastplate where the Atlas is located.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_HarlequinsClearSoulstone}The xenos have managed to free the souls of our ancestors{/d} from their confinement. The memory and wisdom of those that came before us will serve our House, helping build, upon the ruins of the present, a firm foundation for generations to come. I believe in that as I believe in the divine light of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia pose la main sur son plastron, à l'endroit où se trouve l'Atlas.{/n} « Grâce aux xénos, les âmes de nos ancêtres ne sont plus prisonnières de la pierre-esprit. Nous mettrons les souvenirs et la sagesse de nos aïeux au service de notre maison, afin de bâtir sur les ruines du présent des fondations solides pour les générations futures. C'est ma conviction, aussi forte que ma foi en la lumière divine de l'Empereur. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia, göğüs zırhında Atlas'ın olduğu yere dokunuyor.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_HarlequinsClearSoulstone}Zenolar sayesinde atalarımızın ruhları, hapsoldukları yerden kurtuldu{/d}. Atalarımızın anıları ve bilgeliği sayesinde Hanemizin gelişmesiyle, gelecek nesiller için günümüzdeki yıkıntıların üzerine sağlam temeller atılacak. Buna inancım, İmparator'un nuruna inancım kadar sağlam."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia touches her breastplate where the Atlas is located.{/n} "{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_HarlequinsClearSoulstone}The xenos have managed to free the souls of our ancestors{/d} from their confinement. The memory and wisdom of those that came before us will serve our House, helping build, upon the ruins of the present, a firm foundation for generations to come. I believe in that as I believe in the divine light of the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia, göğüs zırhında Atlas'ın olduğu yere dokunuyor.{/n} "Zenolar, atalarımızın ruhlarının hapsoldukları yerden kurtulmasını sağladı. Atalarımızın anıları ve bilgeliği sayesinde Hanemizin gelişmesiyle, gelecek nesiller için günümüz harabelerinin üzerine sağlam temeller atılacak. Bu inancım, İmparator'un nuruna inancım kadar sağlam."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia, göğüs zırhında Atlas'ın olduğu yere dokunuyor.{/n} "Zenolar, atalarımızın ruhlarının hapsoldukları yerden kurtulmasını sağladı. Atalarımızın anıları ve bilgeliği sayesinde Hanemizin gelişmesiyle, gelecek nesiller için günümüz harabelerinin üzerine sağlam temeller atılacak. Bu inancım, İmparator'un nuruna inancım kadar sağlam."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
